text: II I incorporate by reference as fully as if set out verbatim herein, all of the provisions and powers set forth in T.C.A. Section 35-50-110, which section enumerates the administrative powers that I hereby confer upon my Executrix.

texts: as fully as if set out verbatim herein
all of the provisions and powers set forth in T.C.A. Section 35-50-110
